_comment: English translations for Python Cheat Code

python.description: Python cheat sheet is a one-page reference sheet for the Python 3 programming language.

Hello World.title: Hello World
Hello World.description: The famous 'Hello World' program in Python

変数.title: Variables
変数.description: Python cannot declare variables without assignment
変数.code:
age = 18      # age is of type int
name = "John" # name is now of type str
print(name)

データ型.title: Data Types
データ型.code:
| str                          | Text     |
| ---------------------------- | -------- |
| int, float, complex          | Numeric  |
| list, tuple, range           | Sequence |
| dict                         | Mapping  |
| set, frozenset               | Set      |
| bool                         | Boolean  |
| bytes, bytearray, memoryview | Binary   |

リスト.title: Lists
リスト.code:
mylist = []
mylist.append(1)
mylist.append(2)
for item in mylist:
    print(item) # prints out 1,2

If Else.title: If Else

ループ.title: Loops
ループ.description: For loop with break and else

関数.title: Functions
関数.code:
>>> def my_function():
...     print("Hello from a function")
...
>>> my_function()
Hello from a function

ファイル処理.title: File Handling

算術演算.title: Arithmetic Operations
算術演算.code:
result = 10 + 30 # => 40
result = 40 - 10 # => 30
result = 50 * 5  # => 250
result = 16 / 4  # => 4.0 (Float Division)
result = 16 // 4 # => 4 (Integer Division)
result = 25 % 2  # => 1
result = 5 ** 3  # => 125

複合代入.title: Compound Assignment
複合代入.code:
counter = 0
counter += 10           # => 10
counter = 0
counter = counter + 10  # => 10

message = "Part 1."

# => Part 1.Part 2.
message += "Part 2."

文字列.title: Strings
文字列.code:
hello = "Hello World"
hello = 'Hello World'

multi_string = """Multiline Strings
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
consectetur adipiscing elit """

数値.title: Numbers
数値.code:
x = 1    # int
y = 2.8  # float
z = 1j   # complex

>>> print(type(x))
<class 'int'>

ブール型.title: Booleans
ブール型.code:
my_bool = True 
my_bool = False

bool(0)     # => False
bool(1)     # => True

リスト.title: Lists
リスト.code:
list1 = ["apple", "banana", "cherry"]
list2 = [True, False, False]
list3 = [1, 5, 7, 9, 3]
list4 = list((1, 5, 7, 9, 3))

辞書.title: Dictionaries
辞書.code:
>>> empty_dict = {}
>>> a = {"one": 1, "two": 2, "three": 3}
>>> a["one"]
1
>>> a.keys()
dict_keys(['one', 'two', 'three'])
>>> a.values()
dict_values([1, 2, 3])
>>> a.update({"four": 4})
>>> a.keys()
dict_keys(['one', 'two', 'three', 'four'])
>>> a['four']
4

キャスト - 整数.title: Casting - Integer
キャスト - 整数.code:
x = int(1)   # x will be 1
y = int(2.8) # y will be 2
z = int("3") # z will be 3

キャスト - 浮動小数点.title: Casting - Float
キャスト - 浮動小数点.code:
x = float(1)     # x will be 1.0
y = float(2.8)   # y will be 2.8
z = float("3")   # z will be 3.0
w = float("4.2") # w will be 4.2

キャスト - 文字列.title: Casting - String
キャスト - 文字列.code:
x = str("s1") # x will be 's1'
y = str(2)    # y will be '2'
z = str(3.0)  # z will be '3.0'

ヒープ.title: Heap
ヒープ.code:
import heapq

myList = [9, 5, 4, 1, 3, 2]
heapq.heapify(myList) # turn myList into a Min Heap
print(myList)    # => [1, 3, 2, 5, 9, 4]
print(myList[0]) # first value is always the smallest in the heap

heapq.heappush(myList, 10) # insert 10
x = heapq.heappop(myList)  # pop and return smallest item
print(x)                   # => 1

最小ヒープを使った最大ヒープ.title: Max Heap using Min Heap
最小ヒープを使った最大ヒープ.description: Using min heap as max heap
最小ヒープを使った最大ヒープ.code:
myList = [9, 5, 4, 1, 3, 2]
myList = [-val for val in myList] # multiply by -1 to negate
heapq.heapify(myList)

x = heapq.heappop(myList)
print(-x) # => 9 (making sure to multiply by -1 again)

スタックとキュー.title: Stack and Queue
スタックとキュー.code:
from collections import deque

q = deque()          # empty
q = deque([1, 2, 3]) # with values

q.append(4)     # append to right side
q.appendleft(0) # append to left side
print(q)    # => deque([0, 1, 2, 3, 4])

x = q.pop() # remove & return from right
y = q.popleft() # remove & return from left
print(x)    # => 4
print(y)    # => 0
print(q)    # => deque([1, 2, 3])

q.rotate(1) # rotate 1 step to the right
print(q)    # => deque([3, 1, 2])

配列風.title: Array-like
配列風.code:
>>> hello = "Hello, World"
>>> print(hello[1])
e
>>> print(hello[-1])
d

ループ.title: Loop
ループ.code:
>>> for char in "foo":
...     print(char)
f
o
o

文字列スライス.title: String Slicing
文字列スライス.code:
>>> msg = "Hello, World!"
>>> print(msg[2:5])
llo
>>> print(msg[:5])
Hello
>>> print(msg[7:])
World!
>>> print(msg[-6:-1])
World

文字列メソッド.title: String Methods
文字列メソッド.code:
text = "Hello World"
print(text.upper())      # => HELLO WORLD
print(text.lower())      # => hello world
print(text.strip())      # => Hello World
print(text.replace("H", "J"))  # => Jello World
print(text.split(" "))   # => ['Hello', 'World']

位置引数.title: Positional Arguments
位置引数.code:
def positional_args(x, y, z):
    return x, y, z

# => (1, 2, 3)
positional_args(1, 2, 3)

キーワード引数.title: Keyword Arguments

複数の戻り値.title: Multiple Return Values
複数の戻り値.code:
def swap(x, y):
    return y, x

x = 1
y = 2
x, y = swap(x, y)  # => x = 2, y = 1

デフォルト値.title: Default Values
デフォルト値.code:
def add(x, y=10):
    return x + y

add(5)      # => 15
add(5, 20)  # => 25

無名関数.title: Anonymous Functions
無名関数.code:
# => True
(lambda x: x > 2)(3)

# => 5
(lambda x, y: x ** 2 + y ** 2)(2, 1)

モジュールから.title: From Module
モジュールから.code:
from math import ceil, floor
print(ceil(3.7))   # => 4.0
print(floor(3.7))  # => 3.0

モジュールの短縮.title: Module Alias
モジュールの短縮.code:
import math as m

# => True
math.sqrt(16) == m.sqrt(16)

ファイル読み込み - 行ごと.title: File Read - Line by Line

ファイル読み込み - 行番号付き.title: File Read - With Line Numbers

文字列の書き込み.title: Write String

文字列の読み込み.title: Read String
文字列の読み込み.code:
with open('myfile1.txt', "r+") as file:
    contents = file.read()
print(contents)

オブジェクトの書き込み.title: Write Object

オブジェクトの読み込み.title: Read Object
オブジェクトの読み込み.code:
with open('myfile2.txt', "r+") as file:
    contents = json.load(file)
print(contents)

確認して削除.title: Check and Delete

定義.title: Definition
定義.code:
class MyNewClass:
    pass

# Class Instantiation
my = MyNewClass()

コンストラクタ.title: Constructor
コンストラクタ.code:
class Animal:
    def __init__(self, voice):
        self.voice = voice
 
cat = Animal('Meow')
print(cat.voice)    # => Meow
 
dog = Animal('Woof') 
print(dog.voice)    # => Woof

メソッド.title: Methods

クラス変数.title: Class Variables
クラス変数.code:
class MyClass:
    class_variable = "A class variable!"

# => A class variable!
print(MyClass.class_variable)

x = MyClass()
 
# => A class variable!
print(x.class_variable)

Super()関数.title: Super() Function

__repr__()メソッド.title: __repr__() Method

ポリモーフィズム.title: Polymorphism

オーバーライド.title: Override

継承.title: Inheritance

コメント.title: Comments
コメント.code:
# This is a single line comments.

""" Multiline strings can be written
    using three "s, and are often used
    as documentation.
"""

''' Multiline strings can be written
    using three 's, and are often used
    as documentation.
'''

ジェネレータ.title: Generators

ジェネレータからリストへ.title: Generator to List
ジェネレータからリストへ.code:
values = (-x for x in [1,2,3,4,5])
gen_to_list = list(values)

# => [-1, -2, -3, -4, -5]
print(gen_to_list)

例外の処理.title: Exception Handling
例外の処理.code:
try:
    # Use "raise" to raise an error
    raise IndexError("This is an index error")
except IndexError as e:
    pass                 # Pass is just a no-op. Usually you would do recovery here.
except (TypeError, NameError):
    pass                 # Multiple exceptions can be handled together, if required.
else:                    # Optional clause to the try/except block. Must follow all except blocks
    print("All good!")   # Runs only if the code in try raises no exceptions
finally:                 # Execute under all circumstances
    print("We can clean up resources here")
